title: Senzing Entity JSON (Recommended Structure)
description: Validates the recommended Senzing JSON structure: root keys + FEATURES array of flat feature objects; payload scalars at root.

FEATURES.description: All mapped features as flat objects; one object per feature instance.

items.description: Flat feature object; values are scalars only.

additionalProperties.description: Payload attributes at root must be scalars; no nested objects/arrays besides FEATURES.
